block.p: LEBE-Marjorie. Of Bal Harbour, FL, formerly of Woodmere, LI. Wife of the late Milton Lebe and David Nirenberg. Beloved mother of Ann and Joe Golenternek, Jane and David Mack, Susan and Richard Kampe, Mitchell and Arlene Lebe. Cherished grandmother of Jennifer, Nancy and David Malvin; Adam and Jed Kampe; Matthew Lebe. Funeral services on May 9 at 11:15 AM at Lakeside Memorial Park, Miami.
